Module Assegnamento1
Package com.softwareengineering.assegnamento1

Class Member

java.lang.Object
com.softwareengineering.assegnamento1.Person
com.softwareengineering.assegnamento1.Member
Direct Known Subclasses:
Admin
public class Member
extends Person
The Member class defines a generic member of the club

It can:

- Can subscribe to an activity.

- Can unsubcribe from an activity.

  • Constructor Details

    • Member

      public Member​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Class constructor.

      Invokes the parent Person's constructor.

      Parameters:
      name - of the member
      surname - of the member
      email - of the member
      password - of the member
      See Also:
      Person

  • Method Details

    • printMemberList

      public void printMemberList()
      Prints the list of club members to the logger.

      Only an Admin can access the member list.

      (NOTE: this list is different from the list of the members that are enrolled in an activity because this involves all the club members).

    • printActivityList

      public void printActivityList()
      Prints the list of activities to the logger.

      Only an Admin can access the activity list.

    • enrollActivity

      public void enrollActivity​(Activity a)
      Allows a member to sign up for an activity.

      Parameters:
      a - the activity to which the member wants to subscribe.

    • quitActivity

      public void quitActivity​(Activity a)
      Allows a member to unsubscribe from an activity.

      Parameters:
      a - the activity from which the member wants to unsubscribe.

    • updateActivity

      public void updateActivity​(Activity oldActivity, Activity newActivity)
      Allows to swap an old activity with a new one.

      Only an Admin can change activities.

      Parameters:
      oldActivity - the activity that will be changed.

      newActivity - the activity that will be set.

    • updateMember

      public void updateMember​(Member oldMember, Member newMember)
      Allows to swap an old member with a new one.

      Only an Admin can change member.

      Parameters:
      oldMember - the member that will be changed.
      newMember - the member that will be set.

    • createActivity

      public void createActivity​(Activity a)
      Allows to create a new activity.

      This activity will be added to the activityList.

      Only an Admin can create activities.

      Parameters:
      a - the activity that will be created.

    • removeActivity

      public void removeActivity​(Activity a)
      Allows to delete an activity

      This activity will be removed from the activityList.

      Only an Admin can remove an activity.

      Parameters:
      a - the activity that will be removed.

    • addMember

      public void addMember​(Member m)
      Allows to add a new member.

      This member will be added to the memberList.

      Only an Admin can add a member.

      Parameters:
      m - the member who will be added.

    • removeMember

      public void removeMember​(Member m)
      Allows to remove a member.

      This member will be removed from the memberList.

      Only an Admin can remove a member.

      Parameters:
      m - the member who will be removed.

    • updateMemberEmail

      public void updateMemberEmail​(Member m, java.lang.String email)
      Allows to change the member's email.

      Only an Admin can edit member's data.

      Parameters:
      m - the member whose email will be set.
      email - the email that will be set.

    • updateMemberName

      public void updateMemberName​(Member m, java.lang.String name)
      Allows to change the member's name.

      Only an Admin can edit member's data.

      Parameters:
      m - the member whose name will be set.
      name - the name that will be set.

    • updateMemberSurname

      public void updateMemberSurname​(Member m, java.lang.String surname)
      Allows to change the members's surname.

      Only an Admin can edit member's data.

      Parameters:
      m - the member whose surname will be set.
      surname - the surname that will be set.

    • updateMemberPassword

      public void updateMemberPassword​(Member m, java.lang.String password)
      Allows to change the member's password.

      Only an Admin can edit member's data.

      Parameters:
      m - the member whose password will be set.
      password - the password that will be set.

    • updateActivityName

      public void updateActivityName​(Activity a, java.lang.String name)
      Allows to change the activity's name.

      Only an Admin can edit activity's data.

      Parameters:
      a - the activity.
      name - the activity's name that will be set.

    • updateActivityType

      public void updateActivityType​(Activity a, com.softwareengineering.assegnamento1.ActivityType type)
      Allows to change the type of activity (from course to competition and viceversa).

      Only an Admin can edit activity's data.

      Parameters:
      a - the activity.
      type - the new type that will be set.
